meanings.definition: A type of exercise in which a person lies facing the floor and, keeping their back straight, raises and lowers their body by bending and straightening their arms.
meanings.sent1: She struggled with pushups during gym class.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he does pushups to strengthen his arms.
meanings.sent3: The dog attempted pushups but ended up rolling on its back instead.
meanings.sent4: His determination to improve led him to do pushups even when tired.
meanings.sent5: The coach demonstrated perfect pushups to the team.

meanings.definition: The act of doing pushups as a form of physical exercise.
meanings.sent1: Pushups are a great way to build upper body strength.
meanings.sent2: After running, she always finishes her workout with pushups.
meanings.sent3: The pushups challenge at the gym left everyone breathless.
meanings.sent4: In the competition, he showed off his impressive pushups.
meanings.sent5: The group cheered as she completed a set of pushups.
